test_repulsion.cpp

1 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
2 #include <boost/make_shared.hpp>
3 #include "lib/repulsion.h"
4 
5 using namespace ros;

7  // quaternions calculated with https://quaternions.online/
8 
16 void test_getters (repulsion& rep, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& dir, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& pos, geometry_msgs::Twist& vel)
17 {
18  EXPECT_EQ(rep.get_dir().header.seq, dir.header.seq);
19  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_dir().header.stamp.toSec(), dir.header.stamp.toSec(), 0.001);
20  EXPECT_EQ(rep.get_dir().header.frame_id, dir.header.frame_id);
21  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_dir().pose.position.x, dir.pose.position.x, 0.001);
22  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_dir().pose.position.y, dir.pose.position.y, 0.001);
23  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_dir().pose.position.z, dir.pose.position.z, 0.001);
24  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_dir().pose.orientation.x, dir.pose.orientation.x, 0.001);
25  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_dir().pose.orientation.y, dir.pose.orientation.y, 0.001);
26  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_dir().pose.orientation.z, dir.pose.orientation.z, 0.001);
27  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_dir().pose.orientation.w, dir.pose.orientation.w, 0.001);
28 
29  EXPECT_EQ(rep.get_pos().header.seq, pos.header.seq);
30  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_pos().header.stamp.toSec(), pos.header.stamp.toSec(), 0.001);
31  EXPECT_EQ(rep.get_pos().header.frame_id, pos.header.frame_id);
32  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_pos().pose.position.x, pos.pose.position.x, 0.001);
33  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_pos().pose.position.y, pos.pose.position.y, 0.001);
34  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_pos().pose.position.z, pos.pose.position.z, 0.001);
35  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_pos().pose.orientation.x, pos.pose.orientation.x, 0.001);
36  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_pos().pose.orientation.y, pos.pose.orientation.y, 0.001);
37  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_pos().pose.orientation.z, pos.pose.orientation.z, 0.001);
38  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_pos().pose.orientation.w, pos.pose.orientation.w, 0.001);
39 
40  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_vel().linear.x, vel.linear.x, 0.001);
41  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_vel().linear.y, vel.linear.y, 0.001);
42  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_vel().linear.z, vel.linear.z, 0.001);
43  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_vel().angular.x, vel.angular.x, 0.001);
44  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_vel().angular.y, vel.angular.y, 0.001);
45  EXPECT_NEAR(rep.get_vel().angular.z, vel.angular.z, 0.001);
46 }
47 
51 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testUninitialized)
52 {
53  repulsion rep;
54 
55  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.calc());
56  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.sp_pos());
57  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.sp_vel());
58 
59  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
60  dir.pose.orientation.w = 1; // no rotation
61  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
62  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
63  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
64 }
65 
69 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testMissingInfo)
70 {
71  // create repulsion object
72  repulsion rep;
73 
74  // create result objects
75  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
76  dir.pose.orientation.w = 1; // no rotation
77  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
78  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
79 
80  // initialize repulsion
81  rep.init(5, 10, "linear", 0);
82 
83  // test without calculation
84  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
85 
86  // test without swarm, only calculate
87  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.calc());
88  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
89 
90  // add swarm, test without position
91  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
92  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
93  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
94  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.calc());
95  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
96 
97  // add position, test without setpoint
98  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
99  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
100  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
101  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.calc());
102  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
103 
104  // add setpoint, test with all empty values
105  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
106  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.calc());
107  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
108 
109  // define swarm, add one agent far away
110  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
111  agent.vector.magnitude = 100;
112  swarm_p->vectors.push_back(agent);
113  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
114  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.calc());
115  // no repulsion
116  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
117 
118  // move agent close by
119  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.magnitude = 1;
120  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
121  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
122  // only repulsion: target x=1 (because yaw bearing = 0), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
123  dir.pose.orientation.z = 1;
124  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0;
125  pos.pose.position.x = -2.5;
126  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
127 
128  // test with changed position
129  pos_p->pose.position.y = 1;
130  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
131  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
132  // repulsion x=-2.5, y=-2.5: target y=-1 (because no setpoint given = 0), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
133  dir.pose.position.y = 1;
134  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.924;
135  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.383;
136  pos.pose.position.x = -2.5 / sqrt(2);
137  pos.pose.position.y = 1 - 2.5 / sqrt(2);
138  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
139 
140  // test with changed setpoint
141  pos_p->pose.position.y = 2;
142  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
143  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
144  // repulsion x=-2.5, y=2.5: target y=+1 (because setpoint at y=2), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
145  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.924;
146  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.383;
147  pos.pose.position.x = -2.5 / sqrt(2);
148  pos.pose.position.y = 1 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
149  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
150 }
151 
155 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testMissingInfoVelocity)
156 {
157  // create repulsion object
158  repulsion rep;
159 
160  // create result objects
161  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
162  dir.pose.orientation.w = 1; // no rotation
163  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
164  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
165 
166  // initialize repulsion
167  rep.init(5, 10, "linear", 0);
168 
169  // add swarm with one agent close by
170  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
171  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
172  agent.vector.magnitude = 1;
173  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
174  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
175  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
176 
177  // add velocity setpoint, test without position
178  geometry_msgs::Twist velo;
179  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::Twist> vel_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::Twist>(velo);
180  rep.set_sp_vel(vel_p);
181  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.calc());
182  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
183 
184  // add position, test with all empty values
185  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
186  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
187  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
188  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
189  // repulsion x=-2.5, y=0: target = 0 (because no setpoint given = 0), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
190  dir.pose.orientation.z = 1;
191  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0;
192  vel.linear.x = -2.5;
193  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
194 }
195 
199 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testSetpointOnly)
200 {
201  // create repulsion object
202  repulsion rep;
203 
204  // create result objects
205  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
206  dir.pose.orientation.w = 1; // no rotation
207  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
208  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
209 
210  // test position setpoint without initialization
211  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
212  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
213  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
214  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.sp_pos());
215  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.sp_vel());
216 
217  // test velocity setpoint without initialization
218  geometry_msgs::Twist velo;
219  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::Twist> vel_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::Twist>(velo);
220  rep.set_sp_vel(vel_p);
221  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.sp_pos());
222  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.sp_vel());
223 
224  // initialize repulsion
225  rep.init(5, 10, "linear", 0);
226 
227  // add swarm with one agent close by
228  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
229  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
230  agent.vector.magnitude = 1;
231  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
232  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
233  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
234 
235  // add position, test with all empty values
236  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
237  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
238  // repulsion x=-2.5, y=0: target = 0 (because no setpoint given = 0), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
239  dir.pose.orientation.z = 1;
240  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0;
241  vel.linear.x = -2.5;
242  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
243 
244  // change to position setpoint, test with all empty values
245  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
246  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
247  // only repulsion: target x=1 (because yaw bearing = 0), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
248  pos.pose.position.x = -2.5;
249  dir.pose.orientation.z = 1;
250  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0;
251  vel.linear.x = 0;
252  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
253 }
254 
258 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testPositionOrientation)
259 {
260  // create repulsion object
261  repulsion rep;
262 
263  // initialize repulsion
264  rep.init(5, 10, "linear", 0);
265 
266  // create result objects
267  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
268  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
269  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
270 
271  // add swarm with one agent close by, straight ahead
272  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
273  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
274  agent.vector.magnitude = 1;
275  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
276  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
277  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
278 
279  // set position
280  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
281  pose.pose.position.x = 5;
282  pose.pose.position.y = 9;
283  pose.pose.orientation.w = 1; // facing in x direction
284  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
285  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
286 
287  // set poisition setpoint in x direction
288  pos_p->pose.position.x = 10;
289  pos_p->pose.position.y = 9;
290  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
291 
292  // calculate repulsion
293  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
294  // deadlock, only apply repulsion and move in -x: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
295  pos.pose.position.x = 5 - 2.5;
296  pos.pose.position.y = 9;
297  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
298  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
299  dir.pose.orientation.z = 1; // -x direction
300  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0; // -x direction
301  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
302 
303  // turn into y direction
304  pos_p->pose.position.x = 5;
305  pos_p->pose.orientation.z = 0.707;
306  pos_p->pose.orientation.w = 0.707;
307  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
308 
309  // calculate repulsion
310  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
311  // movement in x and -y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=-1 (because other agent at y=+1)
312  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
313  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 2.5 / sqrt(2);
314  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
315  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
316  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.383; // x and -y direction
317  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.924; // x and -y direction
318  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
319 
320  // turn into negative y direction
321  pos_p->pose.orientation.z = -0.707;
322  pos_p->pose.orientation.w = 0.707;
323  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
324 
325  // calculate repulsion
326  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
327  // movement in +x and +y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=+1 (because other agent at y=-1)
328  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
329  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
330  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
331  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
332  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.383; // x and y direction
333  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.924; // x and y direction
334  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
335 
336  // turn into negative x direction
337  pos_p->pose.orientation.z = 1;
338  pos_p->pose.orientation.w = 0;
339  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
340 
341  // calculate repulsion
342  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
343  // movement in +x: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion x=1 (because other agent at x=-1)
344  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5;
345  pos.pose.position.y = 9;
346  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
347  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
348  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0; // x direction
349  dir.pose.orientation.w = 1; // x direction
350  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
351 
352 }
353 
357 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testPositionObstDir)
358 {
359  // create repulsion object
360  repulsion rep;
361 
362  // initialize repulsion
363  rep.init(5, 10, "linear", 0);
364 
365  // create result objects
366  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
367  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
368  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
369 
370  // add swarm with one agent close by, straight ahead
371  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
372  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
373  agent.vector.magnitude = 1;
374  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
375  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
376  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
377 
378  // set position
379  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
380  pose.pose.position.x = 5;
381  pose.pose.position.y = 9;
382  pose.pose.orientation.w = 1; // facing in x direction
383  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
384  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
385 
386  // set poisition setpoint in x direction
387  pos_p->pose.position.x = 10;
388  pos_p->pose.position.y = 9;
389  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
390 
391  // calculate repulsion
392  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
393  // deadlock, only apply repulsion and move in -x: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
394  pos.pose.position.x = 5 - 2.5;
395  pos.pose.position.y = 9;
396  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
397  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
398  dir.pose.orientation.z = 1; // -x direction
399  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0; // -x direction
400  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
401 
402  // obstacle left
403  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.direction = 1.571;
404  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
405 
406  // calculate repulsion
407  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
408  // movement in x and -y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=-1 (because other agent at y=+1)
409  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
410  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 2.5 / sqrt(2);
411  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
412  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
413  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.383; // x and -y direction
414  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.924; // x and -y direction
415  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
416 
417  // obstacle right
418  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.direction = -1.571;
419  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
420 
421  // calculate repulsion
422  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
423  // movement in +x and +y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=+1 (because other agent at y=-1)
424  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
425  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
426  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
427  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
428  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.383; // x and y direction
429  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.924; // x and y direction
430  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
431 
432  // obstacle behind
433  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.direction = 3.1415;
434  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
435 
436  // calculate repulsion
437  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
438  // movement in +x: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion x=1 (because other agent at x=-1)
439  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5;
440  pos.pose.position.y = 9;
441  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
442  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
443  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0; // x direction
444  dir.pose.orientation.w = 1; // x direction
445  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
446 }
447 
451 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testPositionObstDist)
452 {
453  // create repulsion object
454  repulsion rep;
455 
456  // initialize repulsion
457  rep.init(5, 10, "linear", 0);
458 
459  // create result objects
460  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
461  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
462  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
463 
464  // add swarm with one agent close by, straight ahead
465  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
466  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
467  agent.vector.magnitude = 1;
468  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
469  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
470  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
471 
472  // set position
473  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
474  pose.pose.position.x = 5;
475  pose.pose.position.y = 9;
476  pose.pose.orientation.z = 0.707; // facing in y direction
477  pose.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in y direction
478  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
479  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
480 
481  // set poisition setpoint in x direction
482  pos_p->pose.position.x = 10;
483  pos_p->pose.position.y = 9;
484  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
485 
486  // calculate repulsion
487  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
488  // movement in x and -y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=-1 (because other agent at y=+1)
489  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
490  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 2.5 / sqrt(2);
491  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
492  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
493  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.383; // x and -y direction
494  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.924; // x and -y direction
495  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
496 
497  // obstacle at critical distance
498  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.magnitude = 5;
499  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
500 
501  // calculate repulsion
502  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
503  // movement in x and -y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=-1 (because other agent at y=+1)
504  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
505  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 2.5 / sqrt(2);
506  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
507  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
508  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.383; // x and -y direction
509  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.924; // x and -y direction
510  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
511 
512  // obstacle between critical and avoidance distance
513  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.magnitude = 7.5;
514  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
515 
516  // calculate repulsion
517  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
518  // movement in 0.5*x and -0.25*y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=-0.5 (because other agent at y=+1)
519  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 7.5/2 / sqrt(5/4.0);
520  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 7.5/2 / sqrt(5);
521  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
522  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
523  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.230; // 0.5*x and -0.25*y direction = 26.565
524  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.973; //
525  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
526 
527  // obstacle at avoidance distance
528  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.magnitude = 10;
529  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
530 
531  // calculate repulsion
532  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.calc());
533  // no movement because other agent out of range
534  pos.pose.position.x = 0; // avoidance position is reset
535  pos.pose.position.y = 0;
536  dir.pose.position.x = 5; // agent position is kept
537  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
538  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0; // avoidance direction is reset
539  dir.pose.orientation.w = 1; // no rotation
540  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
541 }
542 
546 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testPositionSetpoint)
547 {
548  // create repulsion object
549  repulsion rep;
550 
551  // initialize repulsion
552  rep.init(5, 10, "linear", 0);
553 
554  // create result objects
555  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
556  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
557  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
558 
559  // add swarm with one agent close by, straight ahead
560  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
561  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
562  agent.vector.magnitude = 1;
563  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
564  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
565  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
566 
567  // set position
568  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
569  pose.pose.position.x = 5;
570  pose.pose.position.y = 9;
571  pose.pose.orientation.w = 1; // facing in x direction
572  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
573  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
574 
575  // set poisition setpoint in x direction
576  pos_p->pose.position.x = 10;
577  pos_p->pose.position.y = 9;
578  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
579 
580  // calculate repulsion
581  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
582  // deadlock, only apply repulsion and move in -x: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
583  pos.pose.position.x = 5 - 2.5;
584  pos.pose.position.y = 9;
585  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
586  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
587  dir.pose.orientation.z = 1; // -x direction
588  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0; // -x direction
589  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
590 
591  // change setpoint to negative y direction
592  pos_p->pose.position.x = 5;
593  pos_p->pose.position.y = 0;
594  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
595 
596  // calculate repulsion
597  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
598  // movement in -x and -y direction: target y=-1 (because setpoint y=-1), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
599  pos.pose.position.x = 5 - 2.5 / sqrt(2);
600  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 2.5 / sqrt(2);
601  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
602  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
603  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.924; // x and -y direction
604  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.383; // x and -y direction
605  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
606 
607  // change setpoint to positive y direction
608  pos_p->pose.position.y = 10;
609  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
610 
611  // calculate repulsion
612  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
613  // movement in -x and +y direction: target y=1 (because setpoint y=1), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
614  pos.pose.position.x = 5 - 2.5 / sqrt(2);
615  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
616  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
617  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
618  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.924; // x and y direction
619  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.383; // x and y direction
620  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
621 
622  // change setpoint to negative x direction
623  pos_p->pose.position.x = 0;
624  pos_p->pose.position.y = 9;
625  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
626 
627  // calculate repulsion
628  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
629  // movement in -x: target x=-1 (because setpoint x=-1), repulsion x=-1 (because other agent at yaw = 0)
630  pos.pose.position.x = 5 - 2.5;
631  pos.pose.position.y = 9;
632  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
633  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
634  dir.pose.orientation.z = 1; // -x direction
635  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0; // -x direction
636  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
637 }
638 
642 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testPositionRepShape)
643 {
644  // create repulsion object
645  repulsion rep;
646 
647  // create result objects
648  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
649  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
650  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
651 
652  // add swarm with one agent straight ahead, between critical and avoidance distance
653  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
654  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
655  agent.vector.magnitude = 8.75;
656  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
657  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
658  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
659 
660  // set position
661  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
662  pose.pose.position.x = 5;
663  pose.pose.position.y = 9;
664  pose.pose.orientation.z = 0.707; // facing in y direction
665  pose.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in y direction
666  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
667  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
668 
669  // set poisition setpoint in x direction
670  pos_p->pose.position.x = 10;
671  pos_p->pose.position.y = 9;
672  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
673 
674  // initialize repulsion with linear function
675  rep.init(5, 10, "linear", 0);
676 
677  // calculate repulsion
678  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
679  // movement in x and -y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=-1 (because other agent at y=+1)
680  double pot = 0.25;
681  double mag = hypot(1, pot);
682  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 0.5 * 8.75 * 1 / mag;
683  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 0.5 * 8.75 * pot/mag;
684  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
685  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
686  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.122; // 0.5*x and -0.125*y direction = 14.0362
687  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.993; // x and -y direction
688  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
689 
690  // initialize repulsion with sine function
691  rep.init(5, 10, "sine", 0);
692 
693  // calculate repulsion
694  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
695  // movement in x and -y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=-1 (because other agent at y=+1)
696  pot = 0.1464466;
697  mag = hypot(1, pot);
698  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 0.5 * 8.75 * 1 / mag;
699  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 0.5 * 8.75 * pot/mag;
700  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
701  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
702  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.073; // 0.5*x and -0.0732*y direction = 8.3315
703  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.997; // x and -y direction
704  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
705 
706  // initialize repulsion with sine function
707  rep.init(5, 10, "exp", 0);
708 
709  // calculate repulsion
710  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
711  // movement in x and -y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=-1 (because other agent at y=+1)
712  pot = 0.35355339;
713  mag = hypot(1, pot);
714  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 0.5 * 8.75 * 1 / mag;
715  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 0.5 * 8.75 * pot/mag;
716  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
717  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
718  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.169; // 0.5*x and -0.1768*y direction = 19.4712
719  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.986; // x and -y direction
720  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
721 }
722 
726 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testPositionDistances)
727 {
728  // create repulsion object
729  repulsion rep;
730 
731  // create result objects
732  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
733  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
734  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
735 
736  // add swarm with one agent straight ahead
737  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
738  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
739  agent.vector.magnitude = 5;
740  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
741  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
742  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
743 
744  // set position
745  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
746  pose.pose.position.x = 5;
747  pose.pose.position.y = 9;
748  pose.pose.orientation.z = 0.707; // facing in y direction
749  pose.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in y direction
750  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
751  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
752 
753  // set poisition setpoint in x direction
754  pos_p->pose.position.x = 10;
755  pos_p->pose.position.y = 9;
756  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
757 
758  // initialize repulsion with invalid distances
759  rep.init(10, 5, "linear", 0);
760 
761  // calculate repulsion
762  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.calc());
763  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
764  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
765  dir.pose.orientation.w = 1; // no rotation
766  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
767 
768  // initialize repulsion with equal distances, agent far away
769  rep.init(1, 1, "linear", 0);
770 
771  // calculate repulsion
772  EXPECT_FALSE(rep.calc());
773  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
774 
775  // initialize repulsion with equal distances, agent critically close
776  rep.init(10, 10, "linear", 0);
777 
778  // calculate repulsion
779  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
780  // movement in x and -y direction: target x=1 (because setpoint x=1), repulsion y=-1 (because other agent at y=+1)
781  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 5 / sqrt(2);
782  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 5 / sqrt(2) ;
783  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.383; // x and -y direction
784  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.924; // x and -y direction
785  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
786 }

853 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testPositionSwarmSize)
854 {
855  // create repulsion object
856  repulsion rep;
857 
858  // initialize repulsion
859  rep.init(5, 10, "linear", 0);
860 
861  // create result objects
862  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
863  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
864  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
865 
866  // set position
867  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
868  pose.pose.position.x = 5;
869  pose.pose.position.y = 9;
870  pose.pose.orientation.z = 0.707; // facing in y direction
871  pose.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in y direction
872  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
873  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
874 
875  // set poisition setpoint in y direction
876  pos_p->pose.position.x = 5;
877  pos_p->pose.position.y = 10;
878  rep.set_sp_pos(pos_p);
879 
880  // add swarm with two agent close by, one left and one right
881  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
882  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
883  agent.vector.magnitude = 1;
884  agent.vector.direction = M_PI / 2.0;
885  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
886  agent.vector.direction = -M_PI / 2.0;
887  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
888  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
889  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
890 
891  // calculate repulsion
892  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
893  // movement in y direction: target in y direction (because setpoint in y direction), no repulsion (because other agents repulsion cancels out)
894  pos.pose.position.x = 5;
895  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5;
896  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
897  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
898  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.707; // facing in y direction
899  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in y direction
900  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
901 
902  // place agents: one forward left and one forward right
903  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.direction = M_PI / 4.0;
904  swarm_p->vectors[1].vector.direction = -M_PI / 4.0;
905  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
906 
907  // calculate repulsion
908  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
909  // movement in -y direction: target in y direction (because setpoint in y direction), repulsion in -y direction (because x repulsion cancels out)
910  pos.pose.position.x = 5;
911  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 2.5;
912  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
913  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
914  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.707; // facing in -y direction
915  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in -y direction
916  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
917 
918  // place agents: both ahead
919  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.direction = 0;
920  swarm_p->vectors[1].vector.direction = 0;
921  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
922 
923  // calculate repulsion
924  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
925  // movement in -y direction: target in y direction (because setpoint in y direction), repulsion in -y direction
926  pos.pose.position.x = 5;
927  pos.pose.position.y = 9 - 2.5;
928  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
929  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
930  dir.pose.orientation.z = -0.707; // facing in -y direction
931  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in -y direction
932  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
933 
934  // place agents: both behind left and right
935  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.direction = 3 * M_PI / 4.0;
936  swarm_p->vectors[1].vector.direction = -3 * M_PI / 4.0;
937  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
938 
939  // calculate repulsion
940  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
941  // movement in y direction: target in y direction (because setpoint in y direction), repulsion in y direction (because x repulsion cancels out)
942  pos.pose.position.x = 5;
943  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5;
944  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
945  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
946  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.707; // facing in y direction
947  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in y direction
948  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
949 
950  // place agents: both behind
951  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.direction = M_PI;
952  swarm_p->vectors[1].vector.direction = M_PI;
953  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
954 
955  // calculate repulsion
956  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
957  // movement in y direction: target in y direction (because setpoint in y direction), repulsion in y direction
958  pos.pose.position.x = 5;
959  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5;
960  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
961  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
962  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.707; // facing in y direction
963  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in y direction
964  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
965 
966  // place agents: one ahead, one behind
967  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.direction = 0;
968  swarm_p->vectors[1].vector.direction = M_PI;
969  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
970 
971  // calculate repulsion
972  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
973  // movement in y direction: target in y direction (because setpoint in y direction), no repulsion (cancels out)
974  pos.pose.position.x = 5;
975  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5;
976  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
977  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
978  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.707; // facing in y direction
979  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in y direction
980  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
981 
982  // add a third agent to the left
983  agent.vector.direction = M_PI / 2.0;
984  swarm_p->vectors.push_back(agent);
985  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
986 
987  // calculate repulsion
988  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
989  // movement in xy direction: target in xy direction (because setpoint in y direction), repulsion in x direction
990  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
991  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
992  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
993  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
994  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.383; // facing in xy direction
995  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.924; // facing in xy direction
996  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
997 
998  // move agent ahead further away
999  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.magnitude = 5;
1000  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
1001 
1002  // calculate repulsion
1003  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
1004  // movement in xy direction: target in y direction (because setpoint in y direction), repulsion in x direction
1005  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
1006  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5 / sqrt(2);
1007  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
1008  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
1009  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.383; // facing in xy direction
1010  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.924; // facing in xy direction
1011  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
1012 
1013  // move agent ahead further away
1014  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.magnitude = 7.5;
1015  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
1016 
1017  // calculate repulsion
1018  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
1019  // movement in xyy direction: target in y direction (because setpoint in y direction), repulsion in x direction
1020  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5 / sqrt(13/4.0);
1021  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5 / sqrt(13/9.0);
1022  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
1023  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
1024  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.472; // facing in xyy direction
1025  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.882; // facing in xyy direction
1026  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
1027 
1028  // move agent ahead further away
1029  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.magnitude = 10;
1030  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
1031 
1032  // calculate repulsion
1033  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
1034  // movement in xyy direction: target in y direction (because setpoint in y direction), repulsion in x direction
1035  pos.pose.position.x = 5 + 2.5 / sqrt(5);
1036  pos.pose.position.y = 9 + 2.5 / sqrt(1.25);
1037  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
1038  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
1039  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.526; // facing in xyy direction
1040  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.851; // facing in xyy direction
1041  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
1042 }
1043 
1047 TEST (UnitTestRepulsion, testVelocity)
1048 {
1049  // create repulsion object
1050  repulsion rep;
1051 
1052  // initialize repulsion
1053  rep.init(5, 10, "linear", 0);
1054 
1055  // create result objects
1056  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped dir;
1057  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pos;
1058  geometry_msgs::Twist vel;
1059 
1060  // set position
1061  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose;
1062  pose.pose.position.x = 5;
1063  pose.pose.position.y = 9;
1064  pose.pose.orientation.z = 0.707; // facing in y direction
1065  pose.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in y direction
1066  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> pos_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(pose);
1067  rep.set_pos(pos_p);
1068 
1069  // add swarm with two agent close by, one left and one right
1070  cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors swarm;
1071  cpswarm_msgs::VectorStamped agent;
1072  agent.vector.magnitude = 1;
1073  agent.vector.direction = M_PI / 2.0;
1074  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
1075  agent.vector.direction = -M_PI / 2.0;
1076  swarm.vectors.push_back(agent);
1077  boost::shared_ptr<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors> swarm_p = boost::make_shared<cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfVectors>(swarm);
1078  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
1079 
1080  // set velocity setpoint in y direction
1081  geometry_msgs::Twist velo;
1082  velo.linear.x = 0;
1083  velo.linear.y = 1;
1084  boost::shared_ptr<geometry_msgs::Twist> vel_p = boost::make_shared<geometry_msgs::Twist>(velo);
1085  rep.set_sp_vel(vel_p);
1086 
1087  // calculate repulsion
1088  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
1089  // movement in y direction: target in y direction (because setpoint in y direction), no repulsion (because other agents repulsion cancels out)
1090  vel.linear.x = 0;
1091  vel.linear.y = 2.5;
1092  dir.pose.position.x = 5;
1093  dir.pose.position.y = 9;
1094  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.707; // facing in y direction
1095  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.707; // facing in y direction
1096  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
1097 
1098  // set velocity setpoint in x direction
1099  vel_p->linear.x = 1;
1100  vel_p->linear.y = 0;
1101  rep.set_sp_vel(vel_p);
1102 
1103  // calculate repulsion
1104  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
1105  // movement in x direction: target in x direction (because setpoint in x direction), no repulsion (because other agents repulsion cancels out)
1106  vel.linear.x = 2.5;
1107  vel.linear.y = 0;
1108  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0; // facing in x direction
1109  dir.pose.orientation.w = 1; // facing in x direction
1110  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
1111 
1112  // set velocity setpoint in xy direction
1113  vel_p->linear.x = 1;
1114  vel_p->linear.y = 1;
1115  rep.set_sp_vel(vel_p);
1116 
1117  // calculate repulsion
1118  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
1119  // movement in xy direction: target in xy direction (because setpoint in x direction), no repulsion (because other agents repulsion cancels out)
1120  vel.linear.x = 2.5 / sqrt(2);
1121  vel.linear.y = 2.5 / sqrt(2);
1122  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.383; // facing in xy direction
1123  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.924; // facing in xy direction
1124  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
1125 
1126  // move agent left further away
1127  swarm_p->vectors[0].vector.magnitude = 7.5;
1128  rep.set_swarm(swarm_p);
1129 
1130  // calculate repulsion
1131  EXPECT_TRUE(rep.calc());
1132  // movement in xyy direction: target in xy direction (because setpoint in xy direction), repulsion in -x direction
1133  vel.linear.x = 2.5 * 0.28108463771482;
1134  vel.linear.y = 2.5 * 0.959682982260667;
1135  dir.pose.orientation.z = 0.6; // facing in xyy direction
1136  dir.pose.orientation.w = 0.8; // facing in xyy direction
1137  test_getters(rep, dir, pos, vel);
1138 }
1139

1144  testing::InitGoogleTest(&argc, argv);
1145  return RUN_ALL_TESTS();
1146 }
